verses.verse: And Ahab <WH256> told <WH5046> Jezebel <WH348> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> Elijah <WH452> had done, <WH6213> and withal <WH3605> how <WH834> he had slain <WH2026> <WH853> all <WH3605> the prophets <WH5030> with the sword. <WH2719>

Then Jezebel <WH348> sent <WH7971> a messenger <WH4397> unto <WH413> Elijah, <WH452> saying, <WH559> So <WH3541> let the gods <WH430> do <WH6213> to me, and more <WH3254> also, <WH3541> if <WH3588> I make <WH7760> not <WH853> thy life <WH5315> as the life <WH5315> of one <WH259> of <WH4480> them by tomorrow <WH4279> about this time. <WH6256>

And when he saw <WH7200> that, he arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> for <WH413> his life, <WH5315> and came <WH935> to Beer-sheba, <WH884> which <WH834> belongeth to Judah, <WH3063> and left <WH5117> <WH853> his servant <WH5288> there. <WH8033>

But he himself <WH1931> went <WH1980> a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> into the wilderness, <WH4057> and came <WH935> and sat down <WH3427> under <WH8478> a <WH259> juniper tree: <WH7574> and he requested <WH7592> <WH853> for himself <WH5315> that he might die; <WH4191> and said, <WH559> It is enough; <WH7227> now, <WH6258> O LORD, <WH3068> take away <WH3947> my life; <WH5315> for <WH3588> I <WH595> am not <WH3808> better <WH2896> than my fathers. <WH4480> <WH1>

And as he lay <WH7901> and slept <WH3462> under <WH8478> a <WH259> juniper tree, <WH7574> behold, <WH2009> then <WH2088> an angel <WH4397> touched <WH5060> him, and said <WH559> unto him, Arise <WH6965> and eat. <WH398>

And he looked, <WH5027> and, behold, <WH2009> there was a cake <WH5692> baked on the coals, <WH7529> and a cruse <WH6835> of water <WH4325> at his head. <WH4763> And he did eat <WH398> and drink, <WH8354> and laid him down <WH7901> again. <WH7725>

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> came again <WH7725> the second time, <WH8145> and touched <WH5060> him, and said, <WH559> Arise <WH6965> and eat; <WH398> because <WH3588> the journey <WH1870> is too great <WH7227> for <WH4480> thee.

And he arose, <WH6965> and did eat <WH398> and drink, <WH8354> and went <WH1980> in the strength <WH3581> of that <WH1931> meat <WH396> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915> unto <WH5704> Horeb <WH2722> the mount <WH2022> of God. <WH430>

And he came <WH935> thither <WH8033> unto <WH413> a cave, <WH4631> and lodged <WH3885> there; <WH8033> and, behold, <WH2009> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came to <WH413> him, and he said <WH559> unto him, What <WH4100> doest thou here, <WH6311> Elijah? <WH452>

And he said, <WH559> I have been very jealous <WH7065> <WH7065> for the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts: <WH6635> for <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have forsaken <WH5800> thy covenant, <WH1285> thrown down <WH2040> <WH853> thine altars, <WH4196> and slain <WH2026> thy prophets <WH5030> with the sword; <WH2719> and I, <WH589> even I only, <WH905> am left; <WH3498> and they seek <WH1245> <WH853> my life, <WH5315> to take it away. <WH3947>

And he said, <WH559> Go forth, <WH3318> and stand <WH5975> upon the mount <WH2022> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068> And, behold, <WH2009> the LORD <WH3068> passed by, <WH5674> and a great <WH1419> and strong <WH2389> wind <WH7307> rent <WH6561> the mountains, <WH2022> and broke in pieces <WH7665> the rocks <WH5553> before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> but the LORD <WH3068> was not <WH3808> in the wind: <WH7307> and after <WH310> the wind <WH7307> an earthquake; <WH7494> but the LORD <WH3068> was not <WH3808> in the earthquake: <WH7494>

And after <WH310> the earthquake <WH7494> a fire; <WH784> but the LORD <WH3068> was not <WH3808> in the fire: <WH784> and after <WH310> the fire <WH784> a still <WH1827> small <WH1851> voice. <WH6963>

And it was <WH1961> so, when Elijah <WH452> heard <WH8085> it, that he wrapped <WH3874> his face <WH6440> in his mantle, <WH155> and went out, <WH3318> and stood <WH5975> in the entering in <WH6607> of the cave. <WH4631> And, behold, <WH2009> there came a voice <WH6963> unto <WH413> him, and said, <WH559> What <WH4100> doest thou here, <WH6311> Elijah? <WH452>

And he said, <WH559> I have been very jealous <WH7065> <WH7065> for the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts: <WH6635> because <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have forsaken <WH5800> thy covenant, <WH1285> thrown down <WH2040> <WH853> thine altars, <WH4196> and slain <WH2026> thy prophets <WH5030> with the sword; <WH2719> and I, <WH589> even I only, <WH905> am left; <WH3498> and they seek <WH1245> <WH853> my life, <WH5315> to take it away. <WH3947>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Go, <WH1980> return <WH7725> on thy way <WH1870> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Damascus: <WH1834> and when thou comest, <WH935> anoint <WH4886> <WH853> Hazael <WH2371> to be king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Syria: <WH758>

And Jehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Nimshi <WH5250> shalt thou anoint <WH4886> to be king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Israel: <WH3478> and Elisha <WH477> the son <WH1121> of Shaphat <WH8202> of Abel-meholah <WH4480> <WH65> shalt thou anoint <WH4886> to be prophet <WH5030> in thy room. <WH8478>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that him that escapeth <WH4422> the sword <WH4480> <WH2719> of Hazael <WH2371> shall Jehu <WH3058> slay: <WH4191> and him that escapeth <WH4422> from the sword <WH4480> <WH2719> of Jehu <WH3058> shall Elisha <WH477> slay. <WH4191>

Yet I have left <WH7604> me seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> in Israel, <WH3478> all <WH3605> the knees <WH1290> which <WH834> have not <WH3808> bowed <WH3766> unto Baal, <WH1168> and every <WH3605> mouth <WH6310> which <WH834> hath not <WH3808> kissed <WH5401> him.

So he departed <WH1980> thence, <WH4480> <WH8033> and found <WH4672> <WH853> Elisha <WH477> the son <WH1121> of Shaphat, <WH8202> who <WH1931> was plowing <WH2790> with twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> yoke <WH6776> of oxen before <WH6440> him, and he <WH1931> with the twelfth: <WH8147> <WH6240> and Elijah <WH452> passed <WH5674> by <WH413> him, and cast <WH7993> his mantle <WH155> upon <WH413> him.

And he left <WH5800> <WH853> the oxen, <WH1241> and ran <WH7323> after <WH310> Elijah, <WH452> and said, <WH559> Let me, I pray thee, <WH4994> kiss <WH5401> my father <WH1> and my mother, <WH517> and then I will follow <WH1980> <WH310> thee. And he said <WH559> unto him, Go <WH1980> back again: <WH7725> for <WH3588> what <WH4100> have I done <WH6213> to thee?

And he returned back <WH7725> from <WH4480> <WH310> him, and took <WH3947> <WH853> a yoke <WH6776> of oxen, <WH1241> and slew <WH2076> them, and boiled <WH1310> their flesh <WH1320> with the instruments <WH3627> of the oxen, <WH1241> and gave <WH5414> unto the people, <WH5971> and they did eat. <WH398> Then he arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> after <WH310> Elijah, <WH452> and ministered <WH8334> unto him.
